about_the_game:
Shockwave is a first-person immersive bomb disposal sim with stealth mechanics that lets you taste an anxious life of a sapper. Work with specialistic equipment to disarm a wide range of explosives. Gather intel to choose the right path in the multi-layered levels and stay out of sight from armed militants.

In Shockwave, you will experience immersive, authentic bomb disposal — verified by world-leading IED experts. Starting from simple improvised charges, through complex, procedurally generated IEDs to immense hand-crafted puzzles with a racing countdown. So hurry up, but be careful… or else…



Bombs don't just "deal damage in a radius" — they generate a shockwave with thermal, chemical and EMP components, which interact with items and architecture.



Work with an authentic EOD robot, the trademark hook-and-line, set water charges, and scan the environment with radars and IR cameras. Wear EOD armor to survive mistakes or leave it behind to stay agile.



Keep a low profile and never antagonize the locals; stay out of sight of armed militants, or they will hunt you down. As a bomb disposal expert, you are a priority target in the area. The enemy will do everything to neutralize you.

Gather precious intel and put together information to make the right preparations and find your way through multi-layered levels in the vein of games such as Deus Ex and Thief.

content_descriptors.notes: It's an explosive ordnance disposal game which includes depictions of death by explosion. Non-player characters might ragdoll or be dismembered. There is also death from bullets.
